"Manufactured by the Ursadine Collective, the Helio is a small personal transport shuttle. It's evironmentally friendly solar array allows for long term opperation at minimal cost.""
# SHIP FEATURES
## 1. Bridge
### 1.1. Control Systems
- Unlock the Shuttle computer using your ID card. - The Shuttle computers network ports can be used to control a number of ship systems. - 1: Toggle Shutters - 2: Toggle External Lights - The Holopad can be used to directly contact other ships or stations.
### 1.2. Safety Systems
- Check that the EVA locker is filled with a hardsuit, air tank, and mini-jetpack. - The shuttle console can be used to toggle the shutters.
## 2. Crew Quarters
### 2.1 Dining Area
### 2.1 Living Area
## 3. Engineering
### 3.1. Power System
- Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - While the Thrusters are off, the Generator can be reduced to 50% power to save fuel. - Check that the solar panels are pointed properly - The Power Monitoring computer can be used to check the power levels of the ship.
### 3.2. Atmospherics
- Ensure that a air canister is wrenched to the connector port. - Set the Ships Air Alarms to Filtering (Wide)
### 3.3 Other Systems
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled. - The wall charger can be used to recharge power cells.
